title: Can't wait to download weekly shows? Find out more by listening...
description: Find out how you can get the whole course now and benefit from the enhanced version of each podcast with synchronised flashcards and a lesson guide featuring all vocabulary and pronunciation tips. The premium version of this course is available now in our store at http://www.radiolingua.com/store/
